title: agnostics are the most delusional lot ever
body:
They actually think that if they say "we're in the middle" that god will forgive them somehow lmfao. "we don't have enough information to make our choice so we dance in the middle"

when it comes to existence, if you don't have "enough information" it means you don't believe in him because no one goes " we don't have enough information of dragons so we don't know whether they exist or not" you go WELL THEN I DON'T THINK THEY EXIST.
